content.detailedDescription:
1. on my front porch my dad was letting dogs in and he noticed it 
2 vary bright lights 
3 plane but it was not moving and had moving lights on it 
4 hard to describe a shape , but the lights moved along it axis and fallowed each other then it would pause over a spot and let of a bright glow ..... like an exploshion , it was there for a while hovering and moving back and forth acrost the sky 
5we joked that it was a ufo vary light harted , we where amazed by the brightess of the lights 
6 we went back in the house and it was drifting off
content.summary: Bright moving light

content.detailedDescription: Between 10:00-10:30 i was in my garage playing pool, the door was open and facing east, me and two of my friends stepped out of the garage to get some of the cool breeze air. i noticed the strange light first, it was a clear cloudless night, friday night, and we could see the stars very clearly but this one stood out because it blinked red, and it moved up and down, side to side like it was dancing. i scanned the sky and all of the other stars were stationary. we could visibly see airplanes flying over head and in the distance, strobe lights, and position lights, and could tell the aircraft were man made planes traveling through the airspace above my house, but this one star stood out, it was in the distance. it flashed white like a star and red. we could tell it was moving around but pretty much stayed in the same orbit. we watched this for maybe an half hour, then lost interest and just figured maybe it was a helicopter. i am a retired usaf f-16 and a-10 crew chief with 23 years of working on and around aircraft. i have traveled the world and i can tell you this was no airplane or helicopter or a star. we just stood there staring at it. we ended up going inside and just chalked it up to a strange sighting. my friend said there was another one that i didn't see but he said he did. kind of strange also about two weeks before that in the same vicinity i witnessed a falling star, not streaking across the sky but a white star coming straight down that disappeared behind the tree line, their was no tail, vapor, or plume. also was stationed at raf bentwaters england in 1987. i personally asked a british national fuel tanker driver i had to escort around raf woodbridge if the rendelshem forest sighting was true, he told me yes it was.
content.summary: Star like but flashing red, stationary from a distance but could visibly tell it was moving left to right and up and down but in a small area, you really had to look at it to tell it was moving, but stayed more or less in the same spot, strange

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home from using a pay phone at chief auto parts store in garland tx,on the corner of jupiter and walnut sreet. it was i am guessing after 4:30 a.M. it was little over a mile from my home. i had to use that phone because my father had ripped out my phone jack fom my bedroom because i had ran up a very expensive phone bill at the time. anyway i had turned to go down my street on hillsdale going east and my mother had gotten up to go to work i guess and had noticed i wasn't in bed and went out lookig for me. anyway she picked my up and we were driving back to the house going east. my mother was chewing me out and i was trying to ignore her like kids do with their parents when their being disciplined. so i started looking out the passenger window and it there was a little bit of low cloud cover at the time, i saw this incredibly hugh object above the houses. i am not sure how high it was i am guessing maybe 2 to 500ft above the houses, again i'm not sure but it was traveling no more than 25 to 30 miles an hour because i looked over to see just how fast we were going at the time. analog speedometers at the time not very accurate but we were also going down a residential street and the speed limit was 30 miles an hour. i looked out the window again and it was still there paralleling us i told my mother to look out the window too but she was telling me she was driving. i told her to speed up so we could get ahead of it i wanted to get to the end of our street so we could take a right turn on runnymeade to lawler then go back east so we could keep following it. i did get my mother to speed up but she stop at our house which was three houses till the end of the street so i got out told my mother to look up and see what she saw and i took off running to the end of the street so i could get a better look without any houses blocking my view. so i saw it pass by on lawler still going eastward about 30 miles an hour, not making a single sound. i couldn't tell exactly how long it was or how large due to the low cloud cover-which now i am guessing it was using for camouflage-but it was longer than 50ft for sure, it took almost 15 seconds for it to pass me by. i have never forgotten that night. at the time i thought it was a military craft or something but i don't know of any military craft that is even a stealth that can move that slow and not making a single sound. i will try and discribe what it looked like. it was dark greyish and i don't want to say cylindrical but it was kind of cigar shaped and extrodanarily long. easly over 15ft or higher could not tell you how long it was, but do the math. it took 15 seconds to pass by me at 25 to 30 miles an hour.
content.summary: Ufo sighting

content.detailedDescription:
Ok, i was having a boring halloween tonight. i have just gotten back from my school basketball tryouts, and i was planning on going trick or treating with my girlfriend tonight, but i didn't. i instead stayed home, watched southpark, and the chiefs game. before the chiefs game, i went outside to check on my dogs for about 20 minutes. about 5 minutes after i had gone outside, i saw something moving rapidly across the sky. the object stopped from time to time, maybe every 5 minutes, but it moved fast and rapidly. now, my home is in peculiar, missouri. this object was in the direction of lee's summit, missouri. i think it was in lee's summit, but it may have been in raymore.
nothing really made me notice it at first, i just looked up at the sky, and boom. there it was. this object had very bright lights that seemed to go on randomly, and it moved very rabidly. as i said, it hovered from time to time. i have heard from some of my friends that they saw something move in the sky too. one of my friends from lee's summit said that they went outside on their front porch, and they saw something move rapidly across the sky. another one of my friends was in a car with a group of people. they were about to go to a halloween party, and they all said they saw something. i looked up lee's summit ufo sightings, and i have found out that ufo sightings in that area are very common. i lost sight of the object, when it seemed to look as if it was descending. it may of landed, but i am not for sure. i had a weird reaction, i was scared, and i ran inside. however, i went into the sunroom, and continued to look out the window at the object. after the sighting, i talked to my mom. she said that it was probably just an airplane or a blimp for the monday night football game. i said that airplanes do not hover, and that blimps probably do not move and change direction as fast as the object i saw.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Very scary to look at, many bright flashing lights and it was a fast moving object.

content.detailedDescription: As i stated in the short version, it was a glowing orangeish ball floating nearly straight above us. we both stopped running down the hill at the same time. we looked up and saw the object. we didn't say a word until it was gone. i felt numb when it was above us. we watched it for a few minutes and then it went from stationary to all the way out of sight in the blink of an eye! there seemed to be a brief trail as it went. though it lasted only seconds. i never heard of anyone else seeing but i know what we saw and i will never forget it!!!
content.summary: A friend and were golf ball hunting and we were running down a hill when we both felt something that made us both stop and look up. there was a glowing orangeish ball  up in the air. it  flew away in an instant.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friends where sitting outside talking when one of my friends looked in the sky and what is that cruising by us in the sky. at first we thought it was an comic,shooting star,burning satellite etc. so it left then 5 mins. later it came back again but this time it was more visible we can tell it was an unknown object,nothing that fly's thru the sky looks like what we saw but then it vanished. then it came back a third time as if it was doing circles around us this time u can see things poking from the side off it. i tried 2 call my brother an tell him what was going on but he say the phone was stat icing then it just cruised thru the sky and left.
content.summary: Ufo sighting 3 times in 20 mins.!

content.detailedDescription:
Driving east on us highway 96 between hutchinson and wichita, ks, when i observed a "weird" looking star. it was brighter than most stars and with the sky being overcast, for one to shine so brightly it caught my attention. it was north of the highway. after seeing this "star" i looked in other directions and noticed two others (one further east and one south). these "stars" did not appear to be moving. 

looking further, i observed it looked like a tear in the dark sky letting light seep through in a triangular shape. as i was driving, the two others disappeared from my line of site, but the one to the north stayed stationary. the star remained in site until i arrived at my home. then i cam inside and looked for a website to report it on.

i was listening to the radio and talking on my cell phone all of the way and had no interference.

i had not been drinking or using illegal substances and am not overly tired. the feelings i experienced were facination at first and then after realizing it was something unknown, i kinda got that x-file like paranoia. i made sure i stayed with traffic and drove through popuplated areas all the way home.

this is my very first reporting.
content.summary: Driving east on highway 96 observed a weird looking star upon further glance it was triangular

content.detailedDescription: I was on the plane taking pictures on the way up in the air because the phone that i had u can turn pictures in to postcards so i started snapping away when the plane got above the clouds it was 3 shining lights flying just on the side of the plane from that day on i seen them on the regular they don't hide from me no more i believe now . but telling people make me mad because no one believe me with my pictures
content.summary: It was three bright balls

content.detailedDescription:
I was returning home on sherman way boulevard in van nuys just south of the van nuys airport.  i was heading west when i looked to my left and saw a around object approximately 8 feet in diameter hovering just above the treetops. 
it was silhouetted against the sky. it looked like polished aluminum, and made no sound. 
i pulled over to the right to watch it.  i had no idea what it was.  
it came forward approximately 5 miles an hour for a few feet,
and made a u-turn, " never varying in speed" not even in the most minute way, unlike any of our aircraft. it was like a marble rolling on a sheet of glass above the treetops. i was 115 feet away from it, when i first saw it.  (i measured it) it continued to go north just above the treetops, until it was out of sight

back then there was nobody to report it to, and it's barely better now, but i swear on my life it happened.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I was driving east, saw 8'-10' sphere, like polished aluminum hovering over a tree 100 to 130 feet away.  i stopped to watch, it came forward then made u-turn, just south of van nuys airport.

content.detailedDescription: The following event took place sometime during mid-september or towards the beginning (i apologize for not documenting this information sooner for records). it was in the early morning around 4 or 4:30am ct and i had left my apartment to pick up food. as i got to the stoplight at the cross section of 45th st. and airport blvd, i used this time to look up at the sky to just observe i guess. then i saw an object that i couldn't identify, which caused me to become quite startled and confused because this was the first time this has happened to me. i leaned forward in my seat to look up through my windshield and noticed it was traveling at a pretty fast speed towards the distance in front of me. i couldn't make much of what i was witnessing, but a few of the valid observations i could make was that it was of a vivid bright glowing green color and traveled to the direction in front of me. at first glance i thought it could have been a firework due to the color of the object, but ruled that out because of the size of the object and its flight pattern. then i thought it could have been a weapon of some sort like a bomb or missile because it almost appeared as if it was flying and descending into the distance, but from my position i witnessed no supporting evidence of impact or landing. it flew at a fast speed and remained in sight for a few seconds (7-10 sec). i couldn't tell if it was very cloudy that night or not, but that may have influenced my short sighting of the object. i was on alarm for the remainder of the car ride with emotions of shock, confusion, and paranoia. what i witnessed was very strange and didn't share any characteristics that we would see from a normal modern flying object.
content.summary: A bright green light flying across the night sky

content.detailedDescription: I was out side riding the yamaha 70 when i  observed the silent traveling craft, proceeded to climb the roof to get a better view.  the craft was gone as fast as i could climb the chimney. at least a footmball field long,  three circular lights at the rear of the craft, totaly silent. second sighting  was about 6 years later traveling northbound over the ocean going towards point magu and i witnessed this from hermosa beach.  interstingto say the least.
content.summary: Object traveling eastbound following pacific coast highway

content.detailedDescription:
It was 11.30p i guess, i was in my computer finishing my job, so by the time it was, i let the dog get out of the house to give him a chance to pee out there, so i look up at the sky and realize the magnificent of what i was looking, then i get into my house for a jacket and my video cam to shot the sky...
(i hate my broken english...) 

i saw a bunch of stars and then i though one of those stars started to move and coming in my way, i started to record and when i have that thing over me i have to choose if i should keep it recording or if i should watch it by my own eyes. i did both but what i saw with my eyes was some kind of disc with blue-white-red flashing sequentially lights in the surface of that "disc" in an unusual altitud, actually i could say it couldn���t be a supersonic air-craft, i could explain it better in spanish.

welll, then after all i got really nervous because i thought they or that could saw me. i don���t really know.

finally i came back to my computer and check the video recording.

playing the video i saw a lot of possible tickling points locating the object i���ve all ready recorded, then i found it, and zooming in the video  so i can watch that craft carefully but by a 5-7 frames going forth in the secuence, a imperceptible flash made me realize that over that "craft" were another "thing" a cigar ufo.

so i have various aspects in this description i could specify to make sense to anothers.
content.summary: Hi tech goverment secret air/space craft then ufo in the analysis omg!

content.detailedDescription: {witness address removed]  evening of august ..31..2011..... object appears from east as orange blinking object rises slight to east as lifting up in air turnswhiter hovers above all night looks like brite star until i take pics ..They turn out to be weired   u  f  o ss...Go to [facebook page name moved to field investigator section/cms/tg] on facebook to veiw photos ill be posting 200 more pics tommorrow...
content.summary: Appears from east to slightly west as orange object.Slowly rising to my east up insky.Turns whiter as rises appears as a bright styar.

content.detailedDescription: I was on 95s around 6:30 am on 10/28/11. just leaving baltimore city i was on 95s for about 8 minutes. i looked left out my window and saw a bright orangish-white orb makiing strange movments. it was moving in a "z" pattern. the orb then just stoped and hovered for about a minute. then suddenely the orb just droped out of the sky straight down in an amazing speed. it droped all the way below the tree lines on the state park to my left. i could not see where it went next. around a minute later i saw a strange "cigar" shape object cross directly in front of me on 95s coming from the same direction the orb dropped. at first i though it was just a plane because bwi airport is near the location. but just when i though it was just an airplane the object suddenely either turned into or turned on some kind of light switch that lit up the whole object. it was so bright i had to turn away for a second. the crazy thing was when i looked up again i no longer saw the cigar shaped object but saw a bright orange orb in its place. as i watched in aw as the object flew out of sight like a light switch was flicked again the orange orb went out and in its place was the cigar-plane like object again. i was speechless.....
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I was on 95 s around 6:30 am, saw i bright orb to my left. orb was moving in a

content.detailedDescription: My girlfiend and i were in our front yard just back from a walk round the neiborhood. it was a very cold clear night so naturally i was gazing at the stars. it was between 11:48 and 12:00  when the first craft silently glided right over my house a little higher than the trees. it was a dull solid like transparent triangle about the size of a small jet covered in small orange lights. as i began to freak out my girlfriend thought i was losing but less than 2 min later the second one a little farther out and higher flew over. she caught a glimpse of it before it went out of sight in the tree line. it was a smaller triangle transparent craft just like the other but the lights were aranged in a different pattern. larger and less of them more of a dull grey blue.
content.summary: The first flew right over my house it was a dull grey black but transparent to it had small orange lights all over it mad no sound at all. the second one appered minutes after it was a smaller transparent ship with grey blue lights.

content.detailedDescription: We were up stairs at 9  10pm a glowing ball slowly passed threw our room it went north to south it seemed to be a liquid typ of blue white energy bubble it passed so close to me i tried to touch it but itaccelerated just enough to avoid my hand still going perfectly straight it was drpping illumanated droplets that vanished into thin air befor they fell coud hit the bed i have thought about thisdaily itwas rigt in my face never seen nothin like it we were lucky maby we told 3peapl about it an we dont talk to no one else but our kids anymore ya ll can call me any one else see it a ball in a bubble   it passed thrue stucco sheetrock that have never been touchedwe dont stay up there no more it did not even slow it down we saw it come in and leave
content.summary: Glowing ball passed thru walls north tosouth 2ft in front of us dripin sparkles it passed slowly i tried to touch it but sped up just exactly enough tro avoid me we will tell you all if you call  we have never looked at stucco or sheetrock in side the wal

content.detailedDescription: Me and my mom had just finished some shopping and we were heading to the gas station at the corner of loop 336 and 105 west davis. it was roughly 8:35pm and my mom reacts to seeing something right as i am seeing it out of the corner of my eye. so i glanced over and we see this really bright solid white light in the sky heading east over the woods, we thought it was a plane at first that was really low but then it changed to a blueish color and double backed on its self and was going west, in a downward approach at a very high rate of speed. then we lost site of it behind the trees. we had no idea what we saw it was very strange, i kept looking over the woods for some kind of explosion but saw nothing. we were in awe, especially my mom because she doesn't believe in that sort of stuff and to be honest i don't think she wants to believe but we cant deny what we saw.
content.summary: A bright white that was headed east  then turned blue and headed back west downwards at a very high rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription:
My dissatisfaction with mufon continues. several months ago i sent my caseworker images of the strange marks on my back. i got no response whatsoever. 

but i'm going to report this anyway for the other people in the area that are seeing and reporting the strange goings ons. mufon may not be interested in getting to the bottom of this, but i am. my documentation will continue as long as the activity continues.

i go outside almost every night and sightings have been continued to be consistent. including paranormal activity that has started happening in the house since the beginning of october, and many unexplained power outages/fluctuations. myself and three witnesses (my sister and our mutual friends, melissa and renee) were sitting in the kitchen one night when my sister and i noticed what we thought was smoke under the table. we just kind of brushed it off until a few minutes later when my friend, melissa, who was sitting next to me, and i noticed something at the same time that alarmed us to the point where we were screaming about it. across the table from us sat renee. behind renee we saw what looked like a smoke/mist and it seemed to be manifesting from nothing and then it began to swirl in a spiral... the only way i can describe it is that it looked like some sort of portal opening up. like something you'd see in a movie. it was only there for a few seconds and then it was gone. it was enough to frighten my friend into leaving as she is extremely religious and sees these type of events as evil & not to be messed with. that's when things inside the house started getting weird. not just at my house, but my sister said she'd been experiencing strange things inside her apartment as well. lights turning off and on at will. the two basement doors (which are locked at all times) were found wide open on more than one occasion. tapping on the windows when no one is outside. doorknobs jiggling and turning. objects going missing for days only to reappear in the very spot they were left. other objects being moved around in the house all by themselves. banging and thuds heard within the house... strange voices being heard. it goes on. it can only be described as a haunting, but i can't help but feel that this is connected to the ufo activity. 

this report is primarily for the landing site i discovered in my yard.

i am willing to let investigator's come down here and take a look at the site, but i recommend that they do it as soon as possible before the site gets too disturbed by weather and animals. i have gathered grass and soil samples and am willing to let investigator's borrow these samples and/or take some of their own.

i'm incredibly alarmed by this, and had a very difficult time sleeping last night. i have created two videos, which i've uploaded to my youtube channel which pretty much explains it all. i've also taken about a dozen pictures, which are in the videos, but they can be sent separately. here are the links:

[links moved to field investigator section/cms/tg]

i think the second video shows it much better.

for others in the area that are seeing/experiencing the same & would like to discuss what's happening with someone who isn't a part of mufon, you can get in touch with me through my youtube channel. just drop me a message! i would love to hear and compair stories! 

[cms note: youtube channels are not advertised on our cms system/tg]
content.summary: Physical evidence of ufo landing in my yard

content.detailedDescription: Was jogging around 6 am saturday morning 10/29/11 and noticed a trangle shaped objet about the size of a small house shooting across the sky.I stopped jogging to observe.The object was traveling at a very high rate of speed across the sky.Their was no stream behind object..The trangle object lloke d as if it had blinking lights.What surprised me was the quickness it covered the entire sky.Their were no clouds and visibility was awesome..The object was very high in the sky..I knew then that we are being visited and no human made object could travel through sky at this rate of speed that i witnessed.
content.summary: Ufo sighting in clear morning sky

content.detailedDescription:
I live in a rual community in n. texas with a good view of airplanes coming and going from dfw airport(120mi away). i have seen many,many, airplanes come and go, i can pick a airplane out of the night sky in a sec.
   but what i have been seeing more frequently is very different.

at around (9:30) on 10/30/11 i saw ,what with a ~non-blinking~ light, was extremly high up in the sky and would have been easy to miss.However i watched this light move for a few minutes then it seemed to get further and further away untill it was gone!

through out the night until dawn!, i saw several of these things. there were lots of planes out for me to compare distance and speed too. 

the 2nd object i saw was wierd, i was focused on the sky between the bottom of orions belt and the star sirius at approx. 5:30am when a "starlike" light slowly appeared outta nowhere.. i would say that it was brighter than any star in the orion constalation but not quite as bright as sirius... it remained stationary and bright for at least five minutes, then it dimmed a little (to about half) and started moving at a steady rate from south to north until it was out of my sight, not because of the curvature of the earth but because it got so far away.... it was very,very high up and seemed to not be in our atmosphere at all. i could see and hear commercial airliners passing *far* beneath flashing and blinking on there way to there destinations.

the 3rd object was a little different, i was facing due east and looking straight up and slightly to the south when i saw another light slowly pulse out of a pitch black space in the sky.. it was really bright and already moving when i spotted it, the light faded to black as soon as it reached its brightest point.. then it lit up again further down its previous course but this time it stayed lit for several seconds to a few minutes and i could easily track it moving against the stars headed north. again very very high up there.. i watched it go all the way across the big dipper and finally like the other object lost sight of it because it was so far away.. 

   4th there was and object right around 5:45 that appeared low in my view looking due west.. saturn was approx 25degrees above the horizon and also due west of me.. it traveled from as far as i could see north. headed south until it was just north and below saturn in my view.. then it stopped!.. it was a pretty bright, steady, white light, (not blinking)flashing or changing color at all. it seemed to be really close(in our air space).. i could see planes going over it, headed(east-west),which is typically the highest planes i see because they are not going to dfw, and also i saw planes on approach to dfw passing behind it relative to my possition.{dfw is 120miles from me south by south east}. i noticed and watched a plane traveling from the ne to sw, headed to dfw, with its lights clear and flashing.. it looked like it was going to pass very close to the object.. and it did! when the plane got to close, the object went black! and after the plane passed it lit up again and started heading south once again...

finally at 6:00-6:30 i noticed a "star" traveling due east.. it was very high like the others and moving really fast.. not streeking, but fast, and with purpose.. it traveled from as far as i could see west to as far as i could see east in like 1 min..Again view not limited because of the curve of the earth, this thing had to be in space or at least orbit... it was of medium brightness and stayed lit the whole time.. i saw a shooting star cross in front of it and the object seemed to be way above the shooting star, so it must have been out of our atmosphere at least.  this one was the best one, simply because of its rate of speed. it stood out like a sore thumb.. again i had planes flying over head and it clearly was not a commercial flight....


what the heck was it??? i didnt see anything besides traveling lights and the best i can figure is that it might be satellites of the space station 
i hope!! i felt very much like a bacteria in a petrie dish tonight, any explanation would be welcomed and weighed.. 
\p.S. this is the first time i have been compelled to report this but its not the first of these i've seen these here.. it was just that there were so many last night it kinda worried me a bit...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Stars lighting up and going out and moving !???

content.detailedDescription: 12-15 solid colder red-orange-yellow orbs colored beam of light propulsion silent moving at approx 2 miles hr viewed from 50 feet moving directly over head. on local news reported seen in four counties
content.summary: Colerd orbs lighted tail propulsion

content.detailedDescription: On oct. 29, 2011 in bethlehem, pa 18015 during the freakish snow storm in october.  we noticed 2 consecutive green light flash in the sky and once more an hour later. light illuminated the whole sky, and only lasted 1-2 seconds each.  after reporting to others miles away they too noticed a flash of light but wasn't green they noticed a blue light flash.  the one reported the blue light flash in the sky in fountain hill, pa about 2 miles from where i saw the green flash. then another person we know living in east stroudsburg, pa about 35 miles from me, saw a blue light flashing in the sky too.
content.summary: Flash of light across sky.

content.detailedDescription: Today my friend and i were having a conversation about aliens and their existence. after a little he told me a of a time he swears that he was either abducted or just messed with by aliens. his story goes "so i was on my couch in the livingvroom watching tv relaxin. i start to dose off and fall asleep, then bam. i wake up and my bodys shaking like i'm having a seizure. i couldn't feel anything i couldn't make a sound. i look up through my kitchen and see two very tall probably 8 9 feet, and very thin entities, standing straight up at my back sliding glass door. a bright white light over them as they just stood and starred. the light started to get brighter then all i remember is waking up on my couch." i questioned him saying it coulda been a dream just seemed real. he swore there was no way, it was verry verry real and is convinced it happened.
content.summary: Friend wakes up shaking then sees very dark entity

content.detailedDescription: I saw three square lights, one of them looked to be grated, move from the position of jupiter at 425 am to out of sight at the southern horizon in approximately four seconds.  please explain this away for me
content.summary: Three square shaped passed above our heads moving south

content.detailedDescription: I was alone in our truck heading to tempe from our home in scottsdale to see a movie with a niece. i stopped at a stop sign when i saw what appeared like a shooting star fly very fast in front of me going from the east to the southwest. i just thought it was a shooting star but it was unusually large and very bright. as i headed southwest on a small street i checked my watch as i was running late for an 8pm movie.  it was 7:21pm. i again looked up and in front of me just in the middle of the crescent moon i saw what i thought was a shooting star seemingly turn into an object with varying, pulsating colors.  it came to a sudden stop as if it was targeting that very spot. then it hovered in front of what appeared to be a small airplane headed southbound.  i thought the plane was going to crash into the object, but instead it looked like it dropped altitude quickly to avoid a collision.  all this time the bright pulsating, blue, yellow, orange and red with white lights object hovered in front of the plane or what looked like in the planes path.  i didn't see the plane again until it reappeared and seemed to be zig zagging away from the object in a southbound direction. it was a clear, cloudless evening and you could see the object with it's continuous strobe, pulsating lights just hover for at least a minute or so. then the object suddenly did a 45% degree turn and took off toward the east.  it then stopped near or just below a "star"; possibly venus.  it hovered there several seconds; still with the strobe and pulsating lights then took off toward the east; in the same direction it had come. i was so startled! i didn't have my camera and couldn't find my blackberry long enough to try for a picture.  it happened so fast. during this entire viewing of this object i was weaving in and out of traffic and traversing from lane to lane trying to keep an eye on it.  i briefly lost a few seconds of contact view when i had to go under a freeway  underpass.  but as soon as i made contact view again i kept an eye on it. the funny thing is my husband said i left the house at exactly 7:20pm. he said he told me to be careful with traffic as i was rushing around and i was trying to make the 8pm movie in tempe with my niece. but when i called my niece and told her about this sighting, she asked me to be careful with traffic and asked me where i was...I said i was at the freeway 101 and chaparral approximately 15 miles from where i live.  but when i looked at my watch (a new s/w); it was only 7:22!! i didn't realize that according to my watch this whole even took only 1 minute until when i returned home later that evening after the movie and my husband asked me what time this all took place and i said about 7:22pm.  he told me what time i called him and told me to look at my blackberry to see what time i called my niece and it was at 7:22pm. that was even more startling! i have not ever seen anything like this.  my immediate family understood.  then yesterday evening my husband said he saw an article about a ufo in a local phoenix newspaper so i read it and listened to the video clip and it sounds and is described by others as i had witnessed it.  the rest of the evening i was feeling very confused; couldn't recall most of the movie and kept losing things.  something normally i don't do.  i hope this helps. thank you for your time. attached is my sketch; drawn to the best of my recollection.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo flew from east to west across sky like a falling star. hovered, blocked plane path, made 45% turn, hovered, took off northeast.

content.detailedDescription:
On october 30, 2011 in mesa, az around 11:30 am,  i was outside on my porch drinking my cup of coffee and i was just casually looking around in the sky while sitting in my lawn chair.  then to the right of me (northwest) i observed a small group of 4 balloons that somebody or something (probably accidentally) had just released in the sky.  it had an interesting formation: two bright neon orange color balloons on top floating, and two dark black color balloons appearing as dead weight which mostly stayed towards the bottom of the group of balloons.  i thought that was an interesting formation and colors, so i took some pictures of them. the two orange balloons were floating and pulling outwards like a "v" while the two black balloons were pretty much almost clinging to each other like dead weight balloons.  nothing really odd about them traversing towards me: it was seen in the northwest while it quickly traversed somewhat south and at a low altitude. the wind  at that time appeared to be blowing directly from the west.

then around 11:55 am in the same direction and area of the earlier balloon sighting, , i saw an enormous amount of individual white color balloons along with one big group of orange color balloons which those were tied together as a single group lagging behind the individual white balloons or bottom area of the formation.  just with the naked eye, the orange group looked like just one big orange object slowly floating in the sky while the white balloons looked like scattered white dots in the sky that were very slowly drifting upwards.  these mass group of traversing balloons which were sparsely separated from each other is the first time (since living at this address a good amount of time) that i had ever seen in that large amount traversing in the sky that surrounds my area.  because i didn't have any pictures of such a large group of flying balloons, i decided to take lots of pictures of those balloons too. the formations of balloons was unique: the orange group of balloons at the bottom of the large area of white balloons that seem to come together like a point as you followed the formation upwards in the flock of balloons.  nothing looked suspicious of them at the moment; however, it didn't dawn on me then that the wind was blowing from the west, and the objects were somewhat heading south or southwest in direction.  as i continued taking pictures of these mass of balloons and observing their flight behavior too, i noticed that the balloons seemed to slowly traverse upwards, but not in the expected way i assume balloons would be typically traversing. the group didn't really spread outwards or move about, but the balloons seem to move in unison like they were all just one big group tied together with strings.  there always seemed to be just one single balloon at the very top of the group.  the balloon formation a few times almost resembled something like the shape of a pine tree: pointy on top while enormous and wide at the bottom.  nonetheless, the balloons still appeared to be like balloons traversing.

then about 2 minutes later, i spotted an orange balloon coming from the same general area where the large group of balloons were first seen which the orange balloon was moving towards me at an angle and it was also moving at a quick pace and low altitude.  at first, i didn't know for sure exactly what type object was traversing until i took one picture of it and reviewed it via the camera. when i recognized it as an orange balloon traversing via the camera's picture reviewer, that's when it dawn on me about the group of balloon's heading.   the orange balloon which was at low altitude but steadily going upwards was quickly traversing in the air; yet, the large group of balloons which came from the same general area were not moving in the same direction as the orange balloon was traversing east.  the group of balloons were just slowly going upwards, but they were traversing somewhat southwest while the wind appeared to blowing directly from the west according to the swaying of leaves and branches on the trees nearby.  that's the part that doesn't make any sense to me.  it may be possible to have an air current going in one direction at a lower altitude while there is a change to the air flow and direction in the higher atmosphere; but the group of balloon had to pass through the lower altitude to reach the higher altitude hence the confliction of balloon travel of the large group of balloons and the orange balloon just seen.  i then realize the opportunity to include landmarks while capturing pictures together of the large group of balloons and single orange balloon traversing near me.  the elevation of the group of balloons were very high in the sky (possible 500 or less feet) while the orange balloon traversing near me is estimated to be about 100 feet or less in altitude.  after the orange balloon had pass by my area, i occasionally still took pictures of the group of balloons.  last sighting of the group of balloon was around 12:10 pm which was now in the southwest direction at an altitude of possibly 2,000 feet.  no white dots in the sky were seen; however, the orange group of balloons were barely still seen  which further below the orange group of balloon was another object  (not seen but on camera) presumably a single white balloon with something like another object hanging from it.

then at 12:13 pm while looking almost southwest in direction, i observed a small white object that seemed to just instantly appear in the sky.  the altitude it seemed to be at may had been between 100 to 200 feet.  it's size appeared to be slightly smaller than a silver dollar coin. it was quickly traversing in the air towards the southeast (possibly with the wind and same rate the wind was blowing.)  when i first saw it, i used manual focus on it.  then after maybe 3 or 4 pictures of it, i decided to try the auto-focus on it since the object appeared big enough for the camera to possibly automatically focus on it.   luckily, the auto-focus didn't get fussy by trying to lock onto the target which sometimes occurs on moving objects or even on very small objects. the camera quickly focused onto the object which made me very happy by it doing that; i then quickly set the auto-focus lever back to manual mode.  during the middle of the event, another dark round object appear close to the white object i was observing .  i didn't want to take any chances of loosing track of the white object or wasting any time trying to focus on the other object.  then near the end of the event,  i also noticed with my left eye a helicopter looking similar to the mesa police type quickly cruising through the area at close range while i had my telescopic lens pointed close to being straight up in the sky.  the white object eventually went over the roof which i quickly went to the north wall of the patio to see if i could catch a glimpse of the white object there.  the white object couldn't be seen in the sky in that area which means the white object went directly over my roof. i didn't bother to go outside the patio since there would had been too many structures in the way of continuing viewing it; not to mention i have neighbors who may find that being a little bizarre in behavior on my part which i'm trying to quit literally avoid that type of possible embarrassment.  to my recollection while viewing the object through the camera lens, the white object appeared to had been wiggling through the air almost like a squirming worm; yet, it does not look anything solid in features like a worm.  the event lasted less than 1 minutes.  now what i found really interesting wasn't until after i download the picture onto my computer.  the reddish color object i saw which just seem to appear was captured on camera.  there was also other round objects captured which together almost seem to form a triangular shape which the white object being the head-point.  during the entire time i observed the white object, not once did i see it disappear on me.  it was in my sight the entire time while observing it via the camera lens.  in one picture i took, where the white object should had been in the center of the picture was not there.  i only captured 2 pictures that show the other objects. what's makes the two pictures bizarre is the fact that the first picture with those other reddish round objects shows the white object which is what i been focusing on.  then the next picture i took thereafter still shows those other objects; yet, the white object which is what i been focusing on is nowhere to be seen in that picture except for those other objects.  in each picture of the other objects, i drew a dotted line to each other object.  both picture match almost identically as with just those other objects; yet, that second picture has no white object which leaves me puzzled as to where the white object disappeared which i had been focusing on?  the area where the white object should had been is nowhere to be seen but just a blue sky.  the only other thing i could think of that may explain the white object disappearance that it must have moved faster than the shutter speed of 1/160 second while at f/9; or it must have just simply wink out for a brief moment at the time i took the picture which i didn't notice.  all the other pictures i took shows the white object except in that one picture showing those other objects.  the camera does have a small time delay between depressing the camera button and actually capturing a picture.  but i just don't see how i couldn't captured the white object in that one picture when i had captured the white object in all the other pictures.
 
then later in the afternoon, i saw a semi-flashing object that was also reddish in color while looking towards the south as i was about to go inside my house.  i wasn't exactly sure what it was that i was observing; however, i suspected and presume it to be a mylar balloon traversing because i seen them flashing like that in the sky in the past.  i took some pictures of it which the sun was near the object's location.  i did a quick review which the picture i viewed just happen to be when the object was turn sideways flat.  at that moment it look like totally something else somewhat similar to a few pictures i had captured in the past, so i continued taking more pictures of the object when it started to head away from the sun.  i did another quick look in the camera reviewer, and i discovered that the object which was traversing was a red star shape (happy face) mylar balloon (with a small string) reflecting sunlight.  it looks different when the skinny part laying flat and only thing seen in that first picture which i quickly reviewed.  so my first initial thought and assumption was correct.
content.summary: Bizarre occurrences; multiple traversing objects.

content.detailedDescription: I saw it for the first time while going some winterization,it was very close to ground,huge cube shaped and bulging sides like it was over inflated. red, green, blue, voilet colored lights tumbling around it in a x-pattern.Moved up,down side to side,falling fast and then coming back to it spot?Is in the nnwestern sky fade to northwest as the night goes by,but not like the stars move in sky.Each night it apears a little farther away,30 days i have seen it when sky is clear. last week we noticed a secondm one in the sky at the same time.Three nights ago we found four of them,west north 20degrees east,and then one in the east by northeast sky.All at different degrees up and across. i cann't find anyone with a camera that takes good night photos,but many people have seen it,and i go to the people and give them my binoculars,and show them where to look,and let them tell me what they saw.The air force base has changed it's flight zone for it's cargo jets,(c-17)(c-130's)(c-5a)and no jets have flown over my house for a month,and they have used this zone for 40 years that i know of!!! these are e.T.'s,!!!! not earth made vehicle's... they were out tonight also........No sound,no human like people?
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Its been here for 30 days,there are more than one,huge,tumbling colored lights

content.detailedDescription: I love walking over bridges, they always give you a good view of the sky. i always have my eye on the sky, and this was strange to me. it was a giant red ball, the size was disproportionate to its elevation. so it was either really low, or extremely big. it was moving very slow across the sky, and was glowing. no flashing lights, which would indicate it wasnt a helicopter, couldnt have been an airplane due to its spherical shape. never seen something like this before.
content.summary: Walking on a bridge over the highway, and saw a glowing red ball in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
This is a follow-up event from my original encounter that occurred approximately on sept. 15, 1989. i want to add that i reported the 1st event to my family, friends and girlfriend. none of them believed me.

i was travelling from los angeles to riveside (west to east) with my girlfriend in her car. i was driving and she was on the passenger side. again it was either hwy 10 or 60 and the approximate time was 1am. somewhere near the city of fontana.

all of a sudden, my girlfriend exclaimed "what is that!" i looked to where her attention was drawn. on the south side of the freeway, there was a large empty field that was lit up like a baseball stadium. there was nothing else there except the tall grass in the field and some trees lining the freeway.

just above the trees, hovering was a large blue/white object. it was stationary but it cast a very, very bright light down upon the field. the object then started to descend towards the field. i then told my girlfriend that was the object i had observed 2 week ago and that i was not lying.

we were driving in the fast lane so i started to pull the car over to get on the shoulder. my intention was to stop and see what it was. i remember thinking to myself, i had to find out what this thing was. then all of sudden my girlfriend stood up in her seat (yes stood up but she was hunched over due to the ceiling of the car) and started screaming hysterically that we were not going over there. she said it like 3-4 times and then grabbed the steering wheel. i lost control of the car for a brief moment.

i then told my girlfriend we were not going over there and to let me drive home. she calmed down a bit but remained standing on her car seat for a little while longer. i drove the car back into the fast lane. while driving away from the field, i could still observe the object in the rear view mirror and the brightly lit field. i lost site of the object and the field due to the trees lining the freeway.

the next day, i reported the encounter to my family and friends but this time i had another witness with me. my girlfriend corroborated the event but she refused to discuss the event further.

eventually, my relationship ended with my girlfriend but we remained in contact for a few years. every now and again, i would bring this night up but she always refused to discuss it. she said it really bothered her and she did not want to talk about it.

this second encounter occured 22 years ago. to this day, i wonder what would have occurred if i was able to pull the car over to the shoulder...
content.summary: Observed large glowing blue/white hovering then begain descent

content.detailedDescription:
I was working in the yard of a rental that had just been built onto. 
i looked up and a huge craft, grey, seemless, took up same area as house,behind the one i was working in the yard of, but also a portion of the one i was working on.  it stopped even with me where i was standing. it was like another dimension.  it opened a space just behind the pilots, i could see inside a woodlike wall with blinking red lights,switches, the 2 pilots wore grey uniforms with hat w/black bill, ensignia on arm.
i was eye to eye with one closest to me, my mind flew thru my childhood and the one closest to me said {in my thoughts} "yes,we have watched you since you were a child". 
i could not move, i was not frightened, i could see the hair on his ears.  they were very dark , neat, i could feel the superiority of them. i wanted to ask questions but i only thought of one other incident of hearing and feeling something, they said they would be back.
i wanted to look at the size, it took up the same space as the top half of a house behind the one i was working on, i could see like port holes with indentations only in my periphial vision of the size, how smooth and the color of the metal.  it was a soft deep grey, so smooth, rounded on sides.
i could not take my eyes off the one entity closest to me, he had on dark large like sunglasses.  at one point he turned to the other pilot and they communicated, then he looked back at me. i didnt know what they said, but it was about me.They both watched me, but the one closest to me did the communication.
then all of a sudden i could move, i tried to look around, and it had disappeared, no noise, and all i could think was nothing that big could leave that fast, but did.
after a few minutes i would feel like i could not remember, then i could.  i will never forget this event for the rest of my life.  it haunts me, but i do know i will see them again.  i cant get this thought out of my mind.
i do not know if the space they opened was for me to see or to go with them. i could feel others were on that craft.
i have watched the program of mufon tonight, i never knew who to tell, as i dont tell very many people about my experience, but i think of it everyday, and many times a day.  it haunts me. one other feeling i had was like i was very close to them, then could see them farther away?? like a lens that was doing a close up and then back off some. 


i also saw the ball of fire this past month that was seen in arizona, texas, and described as maybe an astroid?  no it was not an astroid.
it was very low over my house and the size of a basketball to infinity and i could see military jets very high looking or chasing it. the speed was unbelievable.

if i was more computer literate, i would do a drawing, but unable to do it.
content.summary: Doing yard work, looked up it was just about 25' i froze, it took up space of house there, same space, space opened on side, 2 pilots, uniforms.
